did.unittitle: World War I/Travelogues
World War I/Travelogues
Travelogue poster: “Under the Patronage of H.R.H. The Prince of Wales. With Allenby in Palestine. With Lawrence in Arabia. The Lowell Thomas Travelogues. Including pictures in motion and color”
Graphic of a camel under palm trees from a larger Lowell Thomas travelogue poster. It is an original lithograph on poster board
Travelogue window card: “With Lowell Thomas (of Allenby in Palestine fame) ‘Through Romantic India’”; offset lithograph poster
Travelogue window card: “’Hindustan’, Through Romantic India, Mr. Lowell Thomas will personally appear at each performance”
Travelogue window card: “The Annual Carnagey-Thomas Travelogues. General Allenby’s Campaign in the Holy Land and the Land of the Arabian Nights.”; offset lithograph poster (four different versions)
Window card advertising “Kaiser’s Helmet and other remarkable trophies brought from Berlin by Lowell Thomas…”

Travelogue poster: “Lowell Thomas, Mon., Tues., Wed., Thurs., Fri., Sat., Daily 2:30 ,& 8:30, With Allenby in Palestine and Arabia” [Poster was made in two pieces: 25 complete posters, 9 bottom halves]
World War I/Travelogues
Travelogue poster for the Lowell Thomas Travelogue: “With Allenby in Palestine and Lawrence in Arabia”; lithograph 8 panel poster [one panel is missing]
Large blue travelogue poster: “Thomas Travelogues by Lowell Thomas Himself, With Allenby in Palestine, Covent Garden Royal Opera House”; Morgan Litho Company; 3 panel lithograph poster
Large blue travelogue poster: “Percy Burton Presents, Thomas Travelogues by Lowell Thomas Himself”; Morgan Litho Company; 3 panel lithograph poster
Large blue travelogue poster: “Thomas Travelogues by Lowell Thomas Himself”; Morgan Litho Company; 3 panel lithograph poster
Large blue travelogue poster: “Thomas Travelogues by Lowell Thomas Himself”; Morgan Litho Company; 3 panel lithograph poster
Large blue travelogue poster: “Thomas Travelogues by Lowell Thomas Himself”; Morgan Litho Company; 3 panel lithograph poster [framed and on display in the Special Collections research room]

Large travelogue poster with three military men and one woman: “The Lowell Thomas Travelogues with Allenby in Palestine and Lawrence in Arabia, Under the Direction of Dale Carnagey, Direct from a Years Run in New York and London”; Morgan Litho Company; 2 panel lithograph poster

Large travelogue poster with three military men and one woman: “The Lowell Thomas Travelogues with Allenby in Palestine and Lawrence in Arabia, Under the Direction of Dale Carnagey, Direct from a Years Run in New York and London”; Morgan Litho Company; 2 panel lithograph poster

Large travelogue poster with three military men and one woman: “The Lowell Thomas Travelogues with Allenby in Palestine and Lawrence in Arabia, Under the Direction of Dale Carnagey, Direct from a Years Run in New York and London”; Morgan Litho Company; 2 panel lithograph poster [framed and on display in the Special Collections research room]

Large travelogue poster of Allenby’s head and men on horses: “The Lowell Thomas Travelogues with Allenby in Palestine and Lawrence in Arabia, Under Direction of Dale Carnagey, On No Stage has been Presented Anything More fascinating”; Morgan Litho Company; 5 panel lithograph poster

Large travelogue poster of Allenby’s head and men on horses: “The Lowell Thomas Travelogues with Allenby in Palestine and Lawrence in Arabia, Under Direction of Dale Carnagey, On No Stage has been Presented Anything More fascinating”; Morgan Litho Company; 5 panel lithograph poster

Large travelogue poster of Allenby’s head and men on horses: “The Lowell Thomas Travelogues with Allenby in Palestine and Lawrence in Arabia, Under Direction of Dale Carnagey, On No Stage has been Presented Anything More fascinating”; Morgan Litho Company; 5 panel lithograph poster

Large travelogue poster of Allenby’s head and men on horses: “The Lowell Thomas Travelogues with Allenby in Palestine and Lawrence in Arabia, Under Direction of Dale Carnagey, On No Stage has been Presented Anything More fascinating”; Morgan Litho Company; 5 panel lithograph poster

Large travelogue poster of Allenby’s head and men on horses: “The Lowell Thomas Travelogues with Allenby in Palestine and Lawrence in Arabia, Under Direction of Dale Carnagey, On No Stage has been Presented Anything More fascinating”; Morgan Litho Company; 5 panel lithograph poster [panel two only]

Travelogue poster: “With Allenby in Palestine” at the Philharmonic; single panel lithograph
Travelogue poster of Allenby’s head and men on horses: “With Allenby in Palestine”; Morgan Litho Company; single panel lithograph
Travelogue poster of Allenby’s head and men on horses: “With Allenby in Palestine” at the Philharmonic; Morgan Litho Company; single panel lithograph

World War I/Travelogues
Wadi Araba, caravan in distance [index number 1-14] [photograph]
Wadi Araba, caravan, close-up [index number 1-15] [photograph]
Airplane at Akaba, two men in cockpits [index number 1-32] [hand-colored photograph]
Arab man [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: A Sheik of Araby] [index number 1-78] [hand-colored photograph]
Bedouin sheik on horse [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Tallal El-Hareidhin of Tafas] [photograph]
Arab battery in action, sunset, fighting near Damascus [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Lawrence’s mountain guns in action] [index number 1-104] [hand-colored photograph]

Harry Chase taking motion pictures from armored car [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Mr. Chase opening fire with his cinema camera from the turret of an armored car] [index number 1-106] [hand-colored photograph]
Lowell Thomas in pith helmet sits and servant stands in front of tent with cameras and other equipment on the ground [index number 2-3] [photograph]
Patrol of Ford automobiles in Arabian desert (Lowell Thomas note: This goes with Arabian negatives) [index number 2-133] [hand-colored photograph]
Lowell Thomas on Arab horse [index number 4-12] [hand-colored photograph]
Lowell Thomas on Arab horse [index number 4-12] [photograph]
Lowell Thomas taking notes alongside a disabled tank near Gaza [index number 4-20] [hand-colored photograph]
[left to right] Major Piero Tozzi, Lowell Thomas and Colonel Webb Hayes sit in gondola; gondolier stands at rear [index number 4-26] [hand-colored photograph]
[seated left to right in rear of automobile] Lowell Thomas, Colonel Webb Hayes and Major Piero Tozzi; soldiers on horseback in background [index number 4-27] [hand-colored photograph]
Lowell Thomas and Italian officer standing before a statue of General von Hindenburg [index number 4-41] [hand-colored photograph]
View of Great Pyramid of Giza taken from airplane in flight] [hand-colored photograph]
Mrs. Frances Ryan Thomas wearing Kaiser Wilhelm’s helmet [verso: Fran with the Kaiser’s helmet! Brought from Berlin during the 1918-1919 German Revolution after the Kaiser fled] [photograph]
Woman stands in doorway amid ruins in Italy [hand-colored photograph]
Luisa Tetrazzini [caption: To my friends Mr. and Mrs. Lowell Thomas in remembrance of America that I love so much, Luisa Tetrazzini, Roma 23 Giugno 1918] [photograph]
World War I/Travelogues
T. E. Lawrence standing, three quarter length [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: The archeologist and poet who turned soldier] [index number 1-42] [photograph]
T. E. Lawrence and his bodyguard in the desert [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: “Sidi” Lawrence and his “Sons”] [index number 1-47] [photograph]
T. E. Lawrence in paisley robe, squatting, full-faced, close-up [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Col. T. E. Lawrence] [index number 1-52] [photograph]
T. E. Lawrence in paisley robe, squatting, full-faced, close-up [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Col. T. E. Lawrence] [index number 1-54] [photograph]

T. E. Lawrence in white robe with sword at waist, sitting on floor, side view, right hand on chin [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: The dreamer whose dreams came true] [index number 1-58A] [photograph]
T. E. Lawrence and Lowell Thomas squatting in London Arab [index number 4-4] [photograph]
T. E. Lawrence sitting beside camel [photograph]
T. E. Lawrence, close-up [photograph]
